## Utils.getPkgFromSourceAndImporter() method

Gets the `package` which own the `source` and imported by the `importer`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPkgFromSourceAndImporter(source: string, importer: string | PkgNode): PkgNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | string | The <code>specifier</code> the <code>importer</code> import with |
|  importer | string \| [PkgNode](./packer.pkgnode.md) | The <code>module</code> id or <code>package</code> of the importer |

<b>Returns:</b>

[PkgNode](./packer.pkgnode.md) \| null

The `package` of the target or null if not find
